Sentencas: A novel setup has been designed and mounted to investigate the local electrochemical and thermal behavior of a cell from a 4-cell short stack under reversible operation solid oxide fuel cell/solid oxide electrolyzer (SOFC/SOE).
Titulo: Local electrochemical and thermal investigation of a segmented reversible solid oxide fuel cell and electrolyzer

Sentencas: It consists in the partition of the cell's oxygen electrode into 20 segments, where each segment is controlled by a specific electronic load.
Titulo: Local electrochemical and thermal investigation of a segmented reversible solid oxide fuel cell and electrolyzer

Sentencas: This allows to control the segments independently in galvanostatic or potentiostatic mode.
Titulo: Local electrochemical and thermal investigation of a segmented reversible solid oxide fuel cell and electrolyzer

Sentencas: The configuration also enables local electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) measurements of each segment.
Titulo: Local electrochemical and thermal investigation of a segmented reversible solid oxide fuel cell and electrolyzer

Sentencas: 20 thermocouples were added to measure the local temperature of the segments in order to gain a deeper insight into the cell thermal distribution.
Titulo: Local electrochemical and thermal investigation of a segmented reversible solid oxide fuel cell and electrolyzer

Sentencas: This helps correlating the local thermal and electrochemical responses to the operating parameters.
Titulo: Local electrochemical and thermal investigation of a segmented reversible solid oxide fuel cell and electrolyzer

Sentencas: This specific setup allowed mapping the cell's local behavior based on a multidimensional operating conditions matrix, including current density, temperature, feed gas composition, sweep gas flow and polarization.
Titulo: Local electrochemical and thermal investigation of a segmented reversible solid oxide fuel cell and electrolyzer

Sentencas: Moreover, a durability test of more than 1,000 h helped investigating the local long-term degradation in a reversible (day SOE, night SOFC) configuration.
Titulo: Local electrochemical and thermal investigation of a segmented reversible solid oxide fuel cell and electrolyzer

Sentencas: These results are of significant importance towards optimal operation of a reversible SOC with enhanced durability.
Titulo: Local electrochemical and thermal investigation of a segmented reversible solid oxide fuel cell and electrolyzer
